newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Global Equities Q1 net at 64.5 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Global Equities Q1 net at 64.5 mln pesos.

text.p: Philippine holding concern Global Equities Inc said on Friday it posted a net income of 64.5 million pesos in the first quarter of 1997 on revenues of 214.6 million pesos.
The company did not furnish year-ago comparative figures.
In a statement, Global said it expected to complete its export-oriented business park in southern Manila by the first quarter of 1998.
Global said expansion plans of a cotton manufacturing unit, Adamson and Adamson Inc, is on stream. Construction of new facilities will start by the second quarter this year.
It is also finalising negotiations with partners for the development of a property in Batangas City, south of the capital.
